name: Cup Carrier Media
description: Cup Carrier Media provides handy advertising for better engagement. Providing 40x the engagement, Cup Carrier Media is changing sports sponsorships and out-of-home marketing with unique Portable Billboard(tm) drink carriers and a connected digital engagement
one_liner: Cup Carrier Media provides handy advertising for better engagement. Providing 40x the engagement, Cup Carrier Media is changing sports sponsorships and out-of-home marketing with unique Portable Billboard(tm) drink carriers and a connected digital engagement
